newsitem.title: GERMANY: BASF to spend over 100 mln dmk on upgrade.
newsitem.headline: BASF to spend over 100 mln dmk on upgrade.

text.p: German chemicals giant BASF AG on Wednesday said it planned to invest over 100 million marks in the next year to refurbish its Steamcracker 1 at its main plant in Ludwigshafen.
The modernisation, scheduled to be completed by 1998, will raise the cracker's annual output by 31 percent to 210,000 tonnes of ethylene, BASF said in a statement.
Ethylene and propylene are used to produce plastics, coatings, solvents, vitamins, and products used in plant protection.
